The deadline for submission is June 1st, 2017.&nbsp;Guest Editors: Miko Wilford and Allison Redlich.</span></p>  <p>This special issue will assemble rigorous research and analytical articles that have the potential to deepen our understanding of guilty pleas (and related aspects) and/or influence policy and practice. We invite empirical and theoretical articles written from a psychological, legal, policy, or other relevant perspective that are germane to guilty pleas, related processes, and the actors involved in these decisions.
